title: Broccoli with Cashews and Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['675g fresh broccoli, cut into bite size pieces', '75g butter', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons white vinegar', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '5 tablespoons chopped salted cashews']
